programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.
MST3K: The Undead, 19970308000000 +0000, A woman gets hypnotized back into her Dark Age'd past life while Tom takes a crack at being an observer.
MST3K: Catalina Caper, 19901013000000 +0000, Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, scuba diving, and beach 'bunnies', while another boy's con-artist parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.
MST3K: The Bubble, 20221111000000 +0000, Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.

MST3K: The Final Sacrifice, 19980725000000 +0000, With the help of a mysterious map and a truck-driving drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy McGreggor sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta in search of the answers behind the hooded cult responsible for his father's grisly murder.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: Gorgo
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S09E09, Greedy sailors capture a giant lizard off the coast of Ireland and sell it to a London circus. Then its mother shows up.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.
MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

MST3K: Being From Another Planet, 19920704000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots watch a re-edited version of Time Walker (1982) called "Being From Another Planet" in which a mummy awakened by a university team goes on a killing spree.
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

Beverly Lewis' The Reckoning, 20151011000000 +0000, Shunned by the township she was raised in, a young Amish woman finds herself enjoying an affluent life in the secular world and engaged to a successful businessman. Until a long-lost love unexpectedly returns from her past.

Hello, It's Me, 20150927000000 +0000, A woman coping with the loss of her husband and the task of raising two children on her own meets a handsome, rich man but doesn't feel right about pursuing anything. Stars Kellie Martin and Kavan Smith.
How to Train Your Husband, 20180619000000 +0000, A marriage therapist attempts to fix her own marriage by focusing on how to change her husband. Stars Julie Gonzalo, Jonathan Chase.

Grace & Glorie, 19981213000000 +0000, An emotionally fragile younger woman volunteers to take care of an independent feisty older woman. Stars Gena Rowlands, Diane Lane, Neal McDonough, and Carrie Preston. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
In Love and War, 19961218000000 +0000, A captured British Soldier and a courageous Italian woman fall in love in war-torn Italy during the Nazi occupation. Stars Callum Blue and Barbora Bobulova.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abby sends her girls off to their first day at a new school.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: Serpent's Song
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E18, SG-1's arch-enemy Apophis is dying and seeks sanctuary with O'Neill. But what he really wants is a new host in exchange for his knowledge of the Goa'uld. Will O'Neill grant his request or send him back to the Goa'uld to face his fate?

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E01, When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the city’s shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E02, Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppard’s team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E03, Ronon reconnects with a group of Satedans from his past who enlist the Atlantis team's help on a dangerous mission against the Wraith. But after the Atlantis crew is captured, Ronon is faced with the truth about his old friends’ new loyalties.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E04, During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: Tabula Rasa
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E06, With Atlantis plagued by an amnesia-causing virus, McKay wakes up with no idea who he is or what is going on. Following instructions from a video he recorded earlier, McKay frees himself and sets out to find the key to unlocking this mystery.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E07, Arriving on New Athos for an overnight visit, Teyla and Dr. Keller discover the entire settlement abandoned and their own lives in jeopardy from the Bola Kai, a fierce warrior tribe. The pair must avoid capture until Atlantis sends a search party.

programme.title: The Seer
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E08, With still no trace of the Athosians, Teyla requests an off-world visit to meet with a seer, Davos, who may be able to help her find her people. Meanwhile on Atlantis, Agent Woolsey arrives to observe and review Col. Carter.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: One False Step
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E19, On a routine recon mission, the SG-1 team discovers a new, friendly life form. But the encounter turns deadly for the new race because of a virus SG-1 inadvertently introduces. Can SG-1 develop a vaccine before this plague eradicates a civilization?

programme.title: Show And Tell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E20, A boy mysteriously appears at SGC and pleas for help, claiming the Goa'uld are chasing him to find a race of invisible beings. But the SG-1 team doesn't know that the invisible aliens plan to destroy humanity…and their invasion has already begun!

Stargate SG-1, S02E21, A solar flare sends the SG-1 team back to 1969, where the U.S. military suspects the team of espionage. O'Neill and his team escape with two Woodstock-bound kids, desperate to find the Stargate before they're stuck in the psychedelic past forever.

programme.title: Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E22, O'Neill awakens, seemingly from a 79-year cryogenic sleep, to find that his team is long dead. He soon discovers that it's all a setup and he is actually a prisoner of the Goa'uld, who intend to learn all his secrets…and then destroy him!

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E012, Dylan and Brenda's relationship become strained, while David encourages Donna to have sex with him.

programme.title: Wild Horses

programme.title: The Game Is Chicken
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E016, Steve and Brandon become involved in dangerous drag strip racing. Brenda and Kelly go on a blind double date to make Dylan jealous.

programme.title: It's a Totally Happening Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E017, The Gang celebrates the Christmas season by giving gifts to a group of underprivileged children.

programme.title: Midlife...Now What?

programme.title: Back in the High Life Again
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E019, Dylan's father is released on parole and David feels the fallout from a parent's infidelity.

programme.title: Parental Guidance Recommended
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S03E020, Suspicions arise over Jack's handling of Dylan's trust fund. David is offered a deal by a music label but is pressured to fire Steve as his manager.

programme.title: Dead End

programme.title: The Child is the Father to the Man
